item.title: The Pivotal Role of Tech Leadership in Overseeing the Big Picture
item.description:
The role of an individual overseeing the big picture is pivotal for a company. This role could be filled by a developer, an architect, a Head of Engineering, or a CTO. Depending on the size of the company, itâ€™s not necessary to manage every detail personally, but it is crucial to ensure that essential tasks are completed and that you maintain a comprehensive overview of all operations.

What are the main responsibilities in that role?
